CodeBook markdown file for tidy data variables
Variables:

featurestxt : features.txt file
activitylabels : activity_labels.txt file
subject_test : subject_test.txt file
X_test : X_test.txt
Y_test : Y_test.txt
X_train : train/X_train.txt
Y_train : train/Y_train.txt
subject_train : subject_train.txt
Y_test_label
Y_train_label 
tidy_test : binds test subject, activity and set
data_train : binds train subject, activity and set
tidy_set : merges test set and train set
meanandsd - mean and standard deviation calculations for each variable
avg - the average of each variable
